dcterms:creator: N. Rani
B. Saha
V. Maurya
S. K. Shukla
dcterms:description: A manually annotated dataset containing 120 curated CTI reports related to 36 Android malware families between the years 2015 and 2022, capturing cyber threat concepts and their relationships.
dcterms:title: Manually Annotated Dataset for Model Training and Evaluation

dcterms:creator: M. T. Alam
D. Bhusal
Y. Park
N. Rastogi
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset comprising approximately 12,000 unstructured open-access CTI reports, processed to generate triples for knowledge graph construction and link prediction.
dcterms:title: Large-Scale Dataset for Knowledge Graph Generation and Link Prediction
